title: SPACIOUS WALK-IN CLOSET IN THIS 1BR/1BA APARTMENT FOR LEASE
posting_body: ['Blossom Hill', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '5480 Lean Ave San Jose, CA 9', '* Pricing is subject to change daily - price quotes are valid for 72 hours*', 'Large 1 Bed 1 Bath  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 700 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,496', '* Unit 202 - Available 08/27/22', 'Welcome to Blossom Hill Apartments!', 'Blossom Hill Apartments is a lushly landscaped community featuring a sparkling swimming pool, state of the art fitness center, large recreation room with a full kitchen, a BBQ picnic area and multiple play areas.', 'Blossom Hill also features large floor plans and convenience to shopping center, restaurants, freeways and public transportation.', 'Spacious grounds and winding walkways run throughout the property with courtyard benches along the way.', 'Come visit Blossom Hill Apartments and see for yourself why we are the best in affordability and comfort in San Jose.', 'Property Amenities:', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* Playground', '* Pool', '* Barbecue Area', '* Courtesy Patrol', '* Organized activities', '* Laundry', '* Open Lot Parking', 'Parking:', 'Please contact the office for parking details.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs are allowed.', 'Breed restrictions and weight restriction\xa0may apply.', 'Please contact our office for the pet policies.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Tuesday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Wednesday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Thursday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Friday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Saturday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 4:30pm', 'Management Company:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
